report.title: Samples List for npms_sample_occurrences form 3
report.description: Used by the Samples grid to retrieve the samples associated with a survey and user. User can be identified by their Indicia User ID. A second sample may be linked to a first sample, the id of which is stored in a custom attribute. The id of that custom attribute is passed as a parameter to the report. Second version of the report only returns data for squares you are assigned to.
report.query: SELECT #columns# FROM users u JOIN person_attribute_values pav ON pav.person_id = u.person_id AND pav.person_attribute_id = #person_square_attr_id# AND pav.updated_by_id <> u.id AND pav.deleted = false JOIN locations plot ON plot.parent_id=pav.int_value AND plot.deleted=false JOIN cache_samples_functional csf ON csf.location_id = plot.id AND csf.survey_id = #survey_id# JOIN cache_samples_nonfunctional csnf ON csnf.id = csf.id LEFT JOIN location_attribute_values lavPlotName ON lavPlotName.location_attribute_id=#plot_number_attr_id# AND lavPlotName.location_id=plot.id AND lavPlotName.deleted=false JOIN cache_termlists_terms termPlotType ON termPlotType.id = plot.location_type_id LEFT JOIN sample_attribute_values savLinkToSurveyOne ON savLinkToSurveyOne.sample_id = csf.id AND savLinkToSurveyOne.sample_attribute_id = #s1AttrID# AND savLinkToSurveyOne.int_value <> 0 AND savLinkToSurveyOne.deleted=false LEFT JOIN sample_attribute_values savLinkToSurveyTwo ON savLinkToSurveyTwo.int_value = csf.id AND savLinkToSurveyTwo.sample_attribute_id = #s1AttrID# AND savLinkToSurveyTwo.deleted=false WHERE u.id=#iUserID# AND u.deleted=false #order_by#

param.name: survey_id
param.description: Select the survey to return data for?
param.query: SELECT id, title as caption FROM surveys

param.name: iUserID
param.description: Indicia User ID: use 0 to ignore

param.name: s1AttrID
param.description: The ID of the sample attribute that links a second sample to a first

param.name: plot_number_attr_id
param.description: Id of the location attribute that holds the plot number label

param.name: person_square_attr_id
param.description: Id of the person attribute that holds user squares

column.name: location_name
column.sql: COALESCE( case when lavPlotName.text_value IS null then '' || 'Plot at ' || plot.centroid_sref || ' ('|| termPlotType.term || ') ' || '' else '' || 'Plot ' || lavPlotName.text_value || ' at ' || plot.centroid_sref || ' ('|| termPlotType.term || ') ' || '' end , csf.location_name, csnf.public_entered_sref)

column.name: show_add_sample_2
column.sql: case when savLinkToSurveyOne.id IS NULL AND savLinkToSurveyTwo.id IS NULL THEN true ELSE false END

column.name: survey_number
column.sql: 'Survey ' || case when savLinkToSurveyOne.int_value IS NOT NULL THEN '2 ' ELSE '1' END
